price: Dios les preguntará: "¿Cuántos años han permanecido en la Tierra?"
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
